amendment.description: Amendment transfers $125 million from Veterans Health Administration accounts to the Medical Services account in order to increase the amount of mileage reimbursement that disabled veterans receive for travel for medical services.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase (by transfer) for the Medical Administration by $125 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Moran (KS) amendment (A005) Agreed to by recorded vote: 264 - 152 (Roll no. 495).
